channel.title: Need help making a client
channel.description: Ok i have decided to make my own server. I do not want to release this on silab or moparscapes client as people will dupe and so on. I have decided to release it on my own client. So i make this as i do not no how to add my own items into the client (skillcapes, god armours and so on). I am looking for a team of people to help me, first of all to make the client and also to make a webclient(wont make webclient untill later on). Please post here if you would like to join the team or pm me, Thank you.

item.title: Need help making a client

item.description:

no thank you i could make one myself
but seeing you might send me viruses to build on makes
me a little like “no”

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making a client
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

[quote=“Epic One, post:3, topic:166114”][quote author=barrage time link=topic=225254.msg1941204#msg1941204 date=1198143565]
Ok i have decided to make my own server.
I do not want to release this on silab or moparscapes client as people will dupe and so on.
I have decided to release it on my own client.
So i make this as i do not no how to add my own items into the client (skillcapes, god armours and so on).
I am looking for a team of people to help me, first of all to make the client and also to make a webclient(wont make webclient untill later on).
Please post here if you would like to join the team or pm me, Thank you.
[/quote]

To Rephrase that:

Hi I’m a nub and I dont know how to program, nor do I want to learn so could everybody just please give me everything I want cause I dont want to do it myself. Thxbai.[/quote]

epic one:

hey i’m a complete asshole. i go into threads, insult newbies…do NOT help them at all and feel better about myself.
i started out as a newbie too, got better and now that i have some experience, i feel like instead of not insulting newbies(like i was when i started) I’ll continue the role of the ‘experts’ and insult them for my own personal pleasure.

P.S. im a dickhead

Read full topic
